scripts.ruby: yarn docker:start && yarn ruby:test; yarn docker:stop
scripts.ruby:test: yarn ruby:create && yarn ruby:run:parallel && yarn ruby:report:merge && yarn ruby:report:sandbox
scripts.ruby:test:prod: [ "TRAVIS_EVENT_TYPE" = "cron" ] && yarn ruby:create:noskip || yarn ruby:create && yarn ruby:run:parallel && yarn ruby:report:merge && yarn ruby:report
scripts.ruby:run: cd coverage_tests && APPLITOOLS_BATCH_NAME='Ruby Coverage Tests' APPLITOOLS_BATCH_ID=$(uuidgen) bundle exec rspec spec/coverage/generic
scripts.ruby:run:debug: cd coverage_tests && APPLITOOLS_BATCH_NAME='Ruby Coverage Tests' APPLITOOLS_BATCH_ID=$(uuidgen) APPLITOOLS_SHOW_LOGS='true' bundle exec rspec spec/coverage/generic
scripts.ruby:run:parallel: cd coverage_tests && APPLITOOLS_BATCH_NAME='Ruby Coverage Tests' APPLITOOLS_BATCH_ID=$(uuidgen) bundle exec parallel_rspec -n 6 spec/coverage/generic -i -s 'Native'
scripts.parallel:selenium: cd coverage_tests && bundle exec parallel_rspec -n 3 spec/coverage/generic -o '--tag ~@native'
scripts.parallel:appium: cd coverage_tests && bundle exec parallel_rspec -n 2 spec/coverage/generic -o '--tag @native'
scripts.docker:start: docker run -d -p 4444:4444 --name selenium_chrome --shm-size 6g selenium/standalone-chrome:3.141.59 && docker run -d -p 4445:4444 --name selenium_firefox --shm-size 2g selenium/standalone-firefox:3.141.59
scripts.docker:stop: docker stop selenium_chrome selenium_firefox ; docker rm selenium_chrome selenium_firefox
